title: HUMAN Protocol - Reach millions, Not hundreds
description: HUMAN Protocol enables collaboration at a global scale. Anyone can pay millions of people to complete work on-chain.
cleaned_text: The Routing Layer coordinates all entities within the network, and establishes the framework by which they work together. This process includes fee agreement, staking, slashing, voting, and more. For example, an oracle or blockchain must stake HMT via the Routing Layer to operate in the network. The Execution Layer fulfils the on-chain execution of the various work and responsibilities that the Routing Layer has discovered, assigned and distributed. For example, Workers complete their tasks via the Execution Layer. Every user has a unique requirement on HUMAN Protocol.
